column4: Hi. I normally keep backups, but last week my backups drive died. Today, the main folder that I store pictures in went blank. It's an ext3 filesystem. Any suggestions?
Try an fsck, and use the "locate" command to make sure the files didn't just get moved anywhere. If that doesn't work check /lost+found and try photorec.
Ok, will do. I'm starting a fsck right now. Thanks!
